actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to prohibit an employer from requiring evidence of age of an applicant for a job.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful, under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act, to require evidence of age as a condition for employment, employment agency referral, or labor organization membership.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to prohibit an employer from requiring evidence of age of an applicant for a job.
